items.name: Parque Mirador Peñalolén
items.description: A scenic park with panoramic views of Santiago, hiking trails, and picnic areas.

items.name: Centro Cultural Trawün
items.description: A vibrant cultural center offering workshops, concerts, and local art exhibitions.

items.name: Museo de la Memoria Local
items.description: Small community museum showcasing the history and stories of Peñalolén residents.

items.name: Cerro Las Rosas
items.address: Camino al Cerro Las Rosas, Peñalolén, Santiago
items.description: Popular hill for outdoor activities like hiking and mountain biking, with stunning sunsets.

items.name: Biblioteca Vecinal Los Pensamientos
items.description: Cozy neighborhood library with a strong focus on children's literacy and community programs.

items.name: Feria Orgánica El Encuentro
items.description: Weekly organic market featuring fresh produce, handmade goods, and local food vendors.

items.name: Casa Taller ArteSur
items.description: Artisan workshop and gallery space supporting local artists and handmade crafts.

items.name: Capilla San Luis de Francia
items.description: Historic chapel known for its serene ambiance and traditional architecture.
